metadata.title: CVE-2017-8314 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory Traversal in Zip Extraction built-in function in Kodi 17.1 andearlier allows arbitrary file write on disk via a Zip file as subtitles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kodi - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-bin - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-data - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-eventclients-common - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-eventclients-j2me - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-eventclients-kodi-send - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-eventclients-ps3 - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
kodi-eventclients-wiiremote - 15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kodi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '15.2+dfsg1-3ubuntu1.1').
